author: svn-role
msg: Reduce diskspace needed by our testsuite when using cleanup mode.
A 256 MB ramdrive should be more than enough for running the
tests in parallel mode, but currently isn't.

author: svn-role
msg: Merge the r1483391 group from trunk:
Fix 'svn diff' erroring out on missing tree conflict victims.

author: svn-role
msg: Fix SVN_ERR_ASSERT macro to provide failed expression, instead of
evaluated value when compiled using Visual Studio 2010.
Assertions diagnostic is important. Regression from 1.7.x.

author: svn-role
msg: Fix a link error when configured with --enable-runtime-module-search.

author: svn-role
msg: Merge the r1482759 group from trunk:
Prevent svnserve from exiting when a client connection is aborted.
